format: A data frame with 18 observations on the following 2 variables.

parameters.count: a numeric vector of algal counts (10000 x cells /ml)
parameters.conc: a numeric vector of cadmium chloride concentrations (micro g/L)

title: Effect of cadmium on growth of green alga
description:
Description
Green alga (Selenastrum capricornutum) was exposed to cadmium chloride concentrations
ranging from 5 to 80 micro g/L in geometric progression in 4-day population growth test.
reference:
The data are analysed in Bruce and Versteeg (1992) using a log-normal 
dose-response model (using the logarithm with base 10).
